TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeValidationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时控件执行可选类型验证。The event occurs when a control performs optional type validation. 类型验证时才会发生时属性不是`null`和因果操作发生，如失去焦点的控件。Type validation occurs only when the property is not `null` and a causal action occurs, such as the control losing focus. *键入验证*是能够将格式化的输入的字符串转换为代表的类型属性。*Type validation* is the ability to convert the formatted input string to the type represented by the property. 有关类型验证过程的详细信息，请参阅事件。For more information about the type validation process, see the event. 如果事件处理程序实现为，该处理程序接收类型的参数。If an event handler is implemented for , the handler receives a parameter of type . 此参数包含有关事件，如类型转换过程是否成功、 验证类型和等等的信息。This parameter contains information about the event, such as whether the type conversion process succeeded, the validating type, and so on. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

MemberSignature.Value: public TypeValidationEventArgs (Type validatingType, bool isValidInput, object returnValue, string message);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type validatingType, bool isValidInput, object returnValue, string message) cil managed
Public Sub New (validatingType As Type, isValidInput As Boolean, returnValue As Object, message As String)
public: TypeValidationEventArgs(Type ^ validatingType, bool isValidInput, System::Object ^ returnValue, System::String ^ message);

param.name: validatingType
param.span: ，格式化输入字符串的验证目标类型。

span.span: The that the formatted input string was being validated against.

param.name: isValidInput
param.span: 一个 值，指示格式化字符串是否成功转换为验证类型。

span.span: A value indicating whether the formatted string was successfully converted to the validating type.

param.name: returnValue
param.span: ，是格式化字符串转换为目标类型的结果。

span.span: An that is the result of the formatted string being converted to the target type.
A containing a description of the conversion process.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数构造函数用于初始化此类的相应的只读属性。The parameters to the constructor are used to initialize the corresponding read-only properties of this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Cancel { get; set; }
.property instance bool Cancel
Public Property Cancel As Boolean
public: property bool Cancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否应取消事件的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.

value.span: 如果事件应取消，并且 控件应保留焦点，则为 ；否则为 ，以继续验证过程。

span.span: if the event should be canceled and focus retained by the control; otherwise, to continue validation processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件之前发生事件。The event occurs just before the event. 设置属性`true`中事件处理程序将取消该事件，导致控件保留焦点，除非后续事件设置它的版本属性到`false`。Setting the property to `true` in the event handler will cancel the event, causing the control to retain focus, unless the subsequent event sets its version of the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

.property instance bool IsValidInput
Public ReadOnly Property IsValidInput As Boolean
public: property bool IsValidInput { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示格式化输入字符串是否成功转换为验证类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the formatted input string was successfully converted to the validating type.

value.span: 如果格式化输入字符串可以转换为 属性所指定的类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the formatted input string can be converted into the type specified by the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示成功的`Parse`在找到方法由属性。The property indicates the success of the `Parse` method found in the represented by the property. 此类型必须包含`Parse`方法具有一个或两个以下签名：This type must contain `Parse` method(s) having one or both of the following signatures: `public static Object Parse(string)` `public static Object Parse(string, IFormatProvider)` `Parse` 之前调用控件都将引发事件。`Parse` is called before the control raises the event. 内容，减去的提示字符，会调用此方法属性类。This method is invoked with the contents, minus the prompt characters, of the property of the class. 如果成功，它返回转换后的对象;否则，它将返回`null`。If successful, it returns the converted object; otherwise, it returns `null`. 有关类型验证过程的详细信息，请参阅事件。For more information about the type validation process, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取描述转换过程的文本消息。

span.span: Gets a text message describing the conversion process.
A containing a description of the conversion process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证过程需要格式化的用户将输入转换为定义的类型属性。The validation process entails converting the formatted user input to the type defined by the property. 属性包含转换过程的文本说明。The property contains a text description of the conversion process. 将主要适用时转换失败，如所示属性值`false`。 is primarily useful when conversion fails, as indicated by an property value of `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取格式化输入字符串转换所生成的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that results from the conversion of the formatted input string.

value.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ，表示转换后的类型；否则为 。

span.span: If the validation is successful, an that represents the converted type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型验证进程尝试将格式化的输入的字符串，不包括到由指定的类型的提示字符转换属性。The type validation process attempts to convert the formatted input string, not including prompt characters, to the type specified by the property. 属性表示转换尝试的结果，并且由返回的值等效方法类。The property represents the result of the conversion attempt, and is equivalent to the value returned by the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

span.span: Gets the type that the formatted input string is being validated against.
The target of the conversion process.

value.span: 任何情况下，该值都不应是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证过程时，才出现属性类不是`null`。The validation process only occurs if property of the class is not `null`. 属性引用相同类型，它表示转换过程的目标类型。The property references the same type, which represents the target type of the conversion process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
